item.title: Looking for help with landing page and short Instagram videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I am a social media influencer, I do need help to set up:

^ Gumroad page with my digital products
^ Landing page with Systeme.io
^ And I do need someone to create short and informative marketing videos. That primarily get created with AI. I will send you an example once you get in touch,

I would really appreciate if you respond ONLY if you understand what's all above means. Its great if you can do it all. If not - send me a message which task you are responding to.

I need videos on a monthly basis. So this job has a potential for you to become a long term.

Thank you!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 19:10 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Instagram, Animation
Skills: Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Instagram, Animation

item.title: YouTube Manager for daily vlog channel with huge potential - Upwork
item.description:
SebCam is running around the world -- literally. Imagine Forrest Gump, as a daily blogger. You're late. The journey has already has already begun; Seb started in England, has run across America, New Zealand, and soon Australia, Thailand, India, etc, etc... until he runs the full distance around the world.

The most frustrating comments I get is -- "You deserve more subscribers, and more views, this journey is incredible!!" Here is where you come in - I'm too busy running, to maintain the channel and strategize it's growth and expansion as a documentary style daily vlog reality show.

You must have past EXPERT experience in successful management of YouTube Channels and I expect you to be able.to list these past projects and YouTubers you have worked with, or whom you still continue to manage today.

YouTube: "SebCam" to see the vision in action.....

Budget: $5,000
Posted On: June 22, 2024 19:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, YouTube Monetization, YouTube SEO
Skills: YouTube Shorts, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, YouTube Monetization, YouTube SEO
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Faceless MMA Fighter Documentary - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to assist us in creating a captivating faceless video documentary on an MMA fighter and the origins of their unique fighting style. This project requires someone who can expertly edit footage and bring the story to life. The ideal candidate should have experience in documentary editing, with a keen eye for storytelling and pacing. Attention to detail is crucial, as the footage will require precise synchronization with the narrative. The final product should be visually engaging, emotionally impactful, and reflect the essence of the fighter's journey.   


Skills required:

- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong storytelling and narrative skills
- Ability to synchronize footage with audio
- Attention to detail
- Familiarity with MMA and combat sports
Start your reply with "MMA"  to acknowledge you read the post


Posted On: June 22, 2024 18:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Proficient Thumbnail Designer for a True Crime YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We’re in need of a creative and skilled thumbnail designer who can bring our ideas to life.

QUALIFICATIONS:
-  A good PC with a discrete graphics card that is able to handle the latest photoshop updates and topaz gigapixel/photo ai upscaling process.
- Photoshop Beta updated to the latest version.
- General base knowledge of prompts to use it in Generative AI and Midjourney.

Check out the style we’re looking for. Best examples of thumbnails are on these channels however our goal is to do much better design:

- https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pZ0G4q8Ed8m1MAPxaA0oXfhhD74rAstB-0bMMYW4doU/edit?usp=sharing

- The initial pay that we’re offering for this project is $30 per finished design
- We would aim for 7-9 videos per month with a - turnaround time of 1-2 days ( or less if that’s possible without losing quality so we can offer you more projects later on)

Even if we see that you have potential but don’t understand everything clearly, we will hire you and help you learn everything & understand everything crystal clear - you just need to be willing to learn.

We look forward to working with you!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 22, 2024 18:41 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, YouTube, YouTube Thumbnail
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, YouTube, YouTube Thumbnail
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Blackmagic Cloud Video Editor for Social Media Behind the Scenes Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create engaging behind the scenes videos for social media for our videography services. The videos will showcase our videography services and give our audience an exclusive peek into our creative process.

Your main responsibility will be to edit the footage and add royalty-free music to enhance the viewing experience. You will access proxy footage from our Blackmagic Cloud project, cull the footage, and edit into social media ready edits on an infrequent basis (approximately 2-4 times a month). We will render out the clips as some of the original files may be very large.

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to create visually compelling videos that align with our brand identity. Attention to detail is essential. Candidates with strong portfolios in commercial videography, event videography, and product commercials space are preferred.
    
Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing using Davinci Resolve and Blackmagic Cloud
    - Knowledge of video formats and codecs
    - Familiarity with royalty-free music libraries (Use Artlist.io or Epidemic Sound)
    - Strong storytelling and narrative skills
    - Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work
    - Excellent time management and organizational skills

We are testing out this workflow on Blackmagic Cloud for the first time, and it may evolve into you helping with editing on larger projects in the future as well.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 18:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Social Video Enhancement, Video Transition, Instagram Story, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Social Video Enhancement, Video Transition, Instagram Story, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there,

Our company Skup is looking for a youtube editor for our channel which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/@skupcommerce

Experience is a MUST

You must understand retention and the basics of youtube watch time and creating videos people want to binge

You must be able to research what's already working in the niche as well

We use frame.io for editing feedback

And you'll be editing 1-2 videos per week, typically 1 per week and the video length can be anywhere from 10-120 minutes long though typically on the shorter side

Under 1 week turn around for each video is what we're looking for

Please send over all relevant experience and why we should hire you

I look forward to chatting with you

Also start your application with why you're passionate about youtube video editing, any applications missing this will be immediately discarded

Cheers,
Devin Zander

Hourly Range: $18.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 18:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Cinematic Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
PROVIDE SAMPLE VIDEO WITH REFERENCE TO THE VIDEO IN ATTACHMENT.

Hello,

I am in need of a Cinematic Video Editor, who is also good in music/audio editing.

Your editing style must consist out of the editing elements (high quality clips, captions, and editing) as seen in the video in the attachments.

We will provide the voice over and text.

We are a brand that focuses on Stoic messages. Therefore the clips used must feel Stoic/ masculine (and always in accordance with what is being said in the speech)

Also our sample voice over is in there. You don't have to use the whole voice-over, but 20-30 seconds at least.

let me know if you can!

Kind regards,

Yordi

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 22, 2024 18:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Country: Netherlands
